ygData.subject: Re: Happy Love Bracers spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve cleaned out my e-mail box a bit and have lost the going thread about these bracers.  What are the stats on the bracers?  Who can wear them? I ve overheard
ygData.messageBody:
I've cleaned out my e-mail box a bit and have lost the going thread about
these bracers. What are the stats on the bracers? Who can wear them?

I've overheard the conversation many times, but could never seem to get a
solid quest out of it. Has anyone done the quest? If so, for the sake of not
repeating information on the list, can someone e-mail me the details?

Thanks!
Ezrae 18th lvl DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis


Brad Leon wrote:

> From: Brad Leon <Brad.Leon@...>
>
> what is the name of the troll in third gat? what is the quest to get those
> bracers?
>
> Bactroban 11th lvl Enchantress Quellious Server
>
> Ratraz is the name of the troll, and he waits near the Maiden's Fancy in
> Neriak's Third Gate. If you've ever bought any gems for jewelcraft in 3rd
> gate, you've probably heard the conversation between Molon and Ratraz.
>
> Drexia
> 30th Enchantress
> Tallon Zek
>
